structural_unit_name.en: School of Economics and Business Administration

description.en: The master's exam covers all subjects of the curriculum and consolidates the knowledge acquired in them in e-portfolio and its defense.
description.et: Magistrieksam käsitleb kõiki õppekava õppeaineid ning kinnistab neis omandatud teadmised e-portfoolio ja selle kaitsmise abil.

objectives.en: The purpose of the master's exam is to consolidate the knowledge acquired during the study program.
objectives.et: Magistrieksami eesmärgiks on kinnistada õppekava läbimisel omandatud teadmised.

learning_outcomes.en: A learner who has completed the subject consolidates the knowledge acquired in the curriculum based on his career and development goals.
learning_outcomes.et: Õppeaine läbinud õppija kinnistab õppekavas läbitud teadmised lähtuvalt oma karjääri- ja arengueesmärkidest.

grade_evaluation.en: Criteria: Selection of Artifacts, Descriptive Text, Reflective Commentary, Citations, Navigation, Usability and Accessibility, Text Elements, Layout, and Color, Writing Conventions, Multimedia Elements (Optional) are evaluated on the scale of 0-100 each giving 10% of the final grade, and aggregated (detailed evaluation in Moodle).
grade_evaluation.et: Kriteeriumid: objektide valik, kirjeldav tekst, peegeldavad kommentaarid, tsitaadid, navigeerimine, kasutatavus ja juurdepääsetavus, tekstielemendid, paigutus ja värv, kirjutamisreeglid, multimeediumielemendid (valikuline) on hinnatud skaalal 0–100, mis annab 10% lõpphinne ja summeeritud (täpsem juhis Moodle keskkonnas)

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
